description: This file defines the NotesViewModel class responsible for managing the UI state and CRUD operations for a list of notes in an Android application. It interacts with a repository for data persistence and provides observable data streams for UI components to reactively display notes based on search queries.

classes.name: NotesViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class that manages notes data, handles filtering based on user query, and performs CRUD operations with the notes repository.

methods.name: applyFilter
methods.description: Applies a text filter to a list of notes, returning only those whose title or content contains the filter string.

methods.name: setQuery
methods.description: Sets the current search query used to filter the list of notes.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Inserts or updates a note in the repository asynchronously and executes a callback with the note's id.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note asynchronously and executes a callback upon completion.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads a note by its ID asynchronously and executes a callback with the Note object or null.
